variable.name: NEE_C
description: Annual net ecosystem exchange of CO2 between ecosystem, commonly measured using eddy-covariance. Sign convention: negative indicates C uptake
notes: *Equation assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006
extended.description: Annual net exchange of CO2 between the ecosystem and atmosphere, commonly measured using eddy-covariance. Sign convention: negative indicates C uptake
IPCC.notes: Equation 2.3 (although include some heterotrofic)

variable.name: NEE_cum_C
description: Cumulative net ecosystem exchange over a specified time frame (measured using eddy-covariance or gas exchange in a closed chamber). Sign convention: negative indicates C uptake
notes: Applies to timeframes other than one year. Meaninful only in conjunction with start and end date.
extended.description: NA

variable.name: NEP_C
description: Net ecosystem production estimated biometrically / from ground-based measurements
notes: Covariates will depend on methodology. Currently not acquired for any records in the database.
extended.description: Net ecosystem production estimated biometrically / from ground-based measurements

variable.name: GPP_C
description: Annual gross primary production, commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. A.k.a. "Gross Ecosystem Production".
equations: (1)* GPP_C = R_eco_C - NEE_C; (2)** GPP_C = NPP_5_C + R_auto_C
notes: *Equation 1 assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006. **Equation 2 assumes no net change in non-structural carbohydrate storage.
extended.description: Annual Gross Primary Production (GPP), commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. A.k.a. "Gross Ecosystem Production".

variable.name: GPP_cum_C
description: Cumulative GPP over a specified time frame. Sign convention: positive.
notes: Applies to timeframes other than one year. Meaninful only in conjunction with start and end date.
extended.description: NA

variable.name: TBCF_C
description: Total belowground C flux (through roots)
notes: *equation applies only if ANPP_2_C is throughly quantified, including all aboveground components
extended.description: Total belowground C flux (through roots)

variable.name: NPP_1_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.
equations: NPP_1_OM = ANPP_foliage_OM + (ANPP_woody_stem_OM + ANPP_woody_branch_OM) + BNPP_coarse root_OM + BNPP_fine root_OM
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.

variable.name: NPP_1_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.
equations: NPP_1_C = ANPP_foliage_C + (ANPP_woody_stem_C + ANPP_woody_branch_C) + BNPP_coarse root_C + BNPP_fine root_C
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.

variable.name: NPP_2_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.

variable.name: NPP_2_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.

variable.name: NPP_3_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive NPP.
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive Net Primary Production (NPP).

variable.name: NPP_3_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive NPP.
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive Net Primary Production (NPP).

variable.name: NPP_4_OM
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.

variable.name: NPP_4_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.

variable.name: NPP_5_OM
description: Total NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.
extended.description: Total Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.

variable.name: NPP_5_C
description: Total NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.
extended.description: Total Net Primary Production (NPP), including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.

variable.name: NPP_0_OM
description: NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of other NPP variables
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP)

variable.name: NPP_0_C
description: NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of other NPP variables
extended.description: Net Primary Production (NPP)

variable.name: NPP_woody_OM
description: Woody NPP: annual increments in live woody biomass (branch, stem, coarse root) estimated using allometric equations.
extended.description: Woody Net Primary Production : annual increase in live woody biomass (branch, stem, coarse root) estimated using allometric equations.

variable.name: NPP_woody_C
description: Woody NPP: annual increments in live woody biomass C (branch, stem, coarse root) estimated using allometric equations.
extended.description: Woody Net Primary Production : annual increase in live woody biomass C (branch, stem, coarse root) estimated using allometric equations.

variable.name: NPP_understory_OM
description: Total understory NPP. Components included may vary.
extended.description: Total understory Net Primary Production (NPP)
IPCC.notes: For annual biomass this parameter is not needed for NGHGI

variable.name: NPP_understory_C
description: Total understory NPP. Components included may vary.
extended.description: Total understory Net Primary Production (NPP)
IPCC.notes: For annual biomass this parameter is not needed for NGHGI

variable.name: ANPP_1_OM
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including litterfall and stem growth
extended.description: Annual Aboveground Net Primary Production (ANPP), including litterfall and stem growth
IPCC.notes: all variables where we have the production of non-woody bioamss (leaves, grass) cannot be used since Inventories do not count for non-woody biomass gain and losses (they count in term of stock loss/gain in case of conversion)

variable.name: ANPP_1_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including litterfall and stem growth
extended.description: Annual Aboveground Net Primary Production (ANPP), including litterfall and stem growth
IPCC.notes: all variables where we have the production of non-woody bioamss (leaves, grass) cannot be used since Inventories do not count for non-woody biomass gain and losses (they count in term of stock loss/gain in case of conversion)

variable.name: ANPP_2_OM
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including litterfall, stem growth, and branch turnover
equations: (1) ANPP_2_OM = ANPP_foliage_OM + ANPP_woody_stem_OM + ANPP_woody_branch_OM; (2) ANPP_2_OM = ANPP_foliage_OM + ANPP_woody_OM
extended.description: Annual Aboveground Net Primary Production (ANPP), including litterfall, stem growth, and branch turnover
IPCC.notes: all variables where we have the production of non-woody bioamss (leaves, grass) cannot be used since Inventories do not count for non-woody biomass gain and losses (they count in term of stock loss/gain in case of conversion)

variable.name: ANPP_2_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including litterfall, stem growth, and branch turnover
equations: (1) ANPP_2_C = ANPP_foliage_C + ANPP_woody_stem_C + ANPP_woody_branch_C; (2) ANPP_2_C = ANPP_foliage_C + ANPP_woody_C
extended.description: Annual Aboveground Net Primary Production (ANPP), including litterfall, stem growth, and branch turnover
IPCC.notes: all variables where we have the production of non-woody bioamss (leaves, grass) cannot be used since Inventories do not count for non-woody biomass gain and losses (they count in term of stock loss/gain in case of conversion)

variable.name: ANPP_0_OM
description: Annual aboveground NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of ANPP_1_OM / ANPP_2_OM
extended.description: Annual Aboveground Net Primary Production (ANPP)

variable.name: ANPP_0_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of ANPP_1_OM / ANPP_2_OM
extended.description: Annual Aboveground Net Primary Production (ANPP)

variable.name: ANPP_woody_OM
description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: woody component (ANPP_woody)
extended.description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover

variable.name: ANPP_woody_C
description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: woody component (ANPP_woody)
extended.description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover

variable.name: ANPP_woody_stem_OM
description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: woody stem component (ANPP_woody_stem)
extended.description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot

variable.name: ANPP_woody_stem_C
description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: woody stem component (ANPP_woody_stem)
extended.description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot

variable.name: ANPP_woody_branch_OM
description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: woody branch component (ANPP_woody_branch)
extended.description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.

variable.name: ANPP_woody_branch_C
description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.
notes: Allometric equation recorded as covariate for some records.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: woody branch component (ANPP_woody_branch)
extended.description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.

variable.name: ANPP_foliage_OM
description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but ideally correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.
equations: ANPP_foliage_OM = (total leaf production) - ANPP_folivory_OM + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_OM)
notes: Estimation methods vary, and some covariates are recorded as appropriate. Note that if there is any net change in foliage biomass during the measurement period, ANPP_foliage_OM estimates based on leaf fall that do not correct for changes in foliage biomass do not accurately represent C allocation to foliage production. Note also that unless methods correct for consumption of foliage by herbivores, this measurement excludes leaf production that is consumed by herbivores.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: foliage component (ANPP_foliage)
extended.description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but ideally correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.

variable.name: ANPP_foliage_C
description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but ideally correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.
equations: ANPP_foliage_C = (total leaf production) - ANPP_folivory_C + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_C)
notes: Estimation methods vary, and some covariates are recorded as appropriate. Note that if there is any net change in foliage biomass during the measurement period, ANPP_foliage_OM estimates based on leaf fall that do not correct for changes in foliage biomass do not accurately represent C allocation to foliage production. Note also that unless methods correct for consumption of foliage by herbivores, this measurement excludes leaf production that is consumed by herbivores.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: foliage component (ANPP_foliage)
extended.description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but ideally correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_1_OM
description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_twig indicates maximum twig diameter classified as litterfall.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: litterfall component (ANPP_litterfall)
extended.description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_1_C
description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_twig indicates maximum twig diameter classified as litterfall.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: litterfall component (ANPP_litterfall)
extended.description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_2_OM
description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs
equations: ANPP_litterfall_2_OM = ANPP_litterfall_1_OM + ( ANPP_small branches/ large twigs_OM)
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_branch indicates maximum branch diameter classified as litterfall.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: litterfall component (ANPP_litterfall)
extended.description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_2_C
description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs
equations: ANPP_litterfall_2_C = ANPP_litterfall_1_C + ( ANPP_small branches/ large twigs_C)
notes: Non-required covariate max.diameter_branch indicates maximum branch diameter classified as litterfall.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: litterfall component (ANPP_litterfall)
extended.description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_0_OM
description: Annual litterfall- components included not specified.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: litterfall component (ANPP_litterfall)
extended.description: Annual litterfall- components included not specified.

variable.name: ANPP_litterfall_0_C
description: Annual litterfall- components included not specified.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: litterfall component (ANPP_litterfall)
extended.description: Annual litterfall- components included not specified.

variable.name: ANPP_repro_OM
description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: reproduction component (ANPP_repro)
extended.description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)

variable.name: ANPP_repro_C
description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: reproduction component (ANPP_repro)
extended.description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)

variable.name: ANPP_folivory_OM
description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_OM)*.
equations: ANPP_folivory_OM = (total leaf production_OM) - ANPP_foliage_OM + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_OM)
notes: *We define ANPP_folivory_OM as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_OM) because common measurement methods of ANPP_foliage_OM do not account for ANPP_folivory_OM.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: folivory component (ANPP_folivory)
extended.description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_OM)*.

variable.name: ANPP_folivory_C
description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_C)*.
equations: ANPP_folivory_C = (total leaf production_C) - ANPP_foliage_C + (change in biomass_ag_foliage_C)
notes: *We define ANPP_folivory_C as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_C) because common measurement methods of ANPP_foliage_C do not account for ANPP_folivory_C.
Description: Aboveground Net Primary Production: folivory component (ANPP_folivory)
extended.description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_C)*.

variable.name: woody.mortality_ag_OM
description: Annual biomass mortality--i.e., total aboveground biomass of tree stems that die.
extended.description: Annual biomass mortality--i.e., total aboveground biomass of tree stems that die.

variable.name: woody.mortality_ag_C
description: Total aboveground C of tree stems that die annually.
extended.description: Total aboveground C of tree stems that die annually.

variable.name: BNPP_root_OM
description: Annual root biomass production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)
extended.description: Annual root biomass production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: BNPP_root_C
description: Annual root production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)
extended.description: Annual root production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: BNPP_root_coarse_OM
description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.
extended.description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: BNPP_root_coarse_C
description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.
extended.description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: BNPP_root_fine_OM
description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.
extended.description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: BNPP_root_fine_C
description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.
extended.description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: BNPP_root.turnover_fine_OM
description: Annual turnover (mortality) of fine roots
extended.description: Annual turnover (mortality) of fine roots
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: BNPP_root.turnover_fine_C
description: Annual turnover (mortality) of fine roots
extended.description: Annual turnover (mortality) of fine roots
IPCC.notes: Not IPCC but could be useful since it may be applied with the variable on losses in a gain and loss type of IPCC equation limited to belowground biomass

variable.name: R_eco_C
description: Annual ecosystem respiration,commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. Sign convention: positive.
equations: (1)* R_eco_C = NEE_C - GPP_C; (2) R_eco_C = R_auto_C + R_het_soil_C
notes: *Equation 1 assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006
extended.description: Annual ecosystem respiration,commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. Sign convention: positive.

variable.name: R_eco_cum_C
description: Cumulative ecosystem respiration over a specified time frame (measured using eddy-covariance or gas exchange in a closed chamber). Sign convention: positive.
notes: Applies to timeframes other than one year. Meaninful only in conjunction with start and end date.
extended.description: Cumulative ecosystem respiration over a specified time frame (measured using eddy-covariance or gas exchange in a closed chamber). Sign convention: positive.

variable.name: R_auto_C
description: Annual autotrophic respiration, including above- and belowground components.
notes: Covariates will depend on methodology. Currently not acquired for any records in the database.
extended.description: Annual autotrophic respiration, including above- and belowground components.

variable.name: R_auto_ag_C
description: Annual aboveground autotrophic respiration
notes: Covariates will depend on methodology. Currently not acquired for any records in the database.
extended.description: Annual aboveground autotrophic respiration

extended.description: Annual aboveground respiration of woody stems

variable.name: R_auto_foliage_C
description: Annual foliar respiration
extended.description: Annual foliar respiration

variable.name: R_auto_root_C

notes: If estimated through direct measurement of root gas exchange, covariates should include depth; min.diameter_root; max.diameter_root
extended.description: Annual root respiration (all size classes). Note methodology: root gas exchange/ root exclusion/ isotopes

variable.name: biomass_C

extended.description: Total coarse root biomass. Typical size cutoff (min.diameter_root) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to min.diameter_root = 1 mm when there is an option.

variable.name: biomass_root_coarse_C

variable.name: deadwood_OM
description: Total mass of aboveground dead wood, including standing dead wood and woody debris. IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.
extended.description: Total mass of aboveground dead wood, including standing dead wood and woody debris. IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.
IPCC.notes: IPCC definition (Table 1.1): Includes all non-living woody biomass not contained in the litter, either standing, lying on the ground, or in the soil. Dead wood includes wood lying on the surface, dead roots, and stumps, larger than or equal to 10 cm in diameter (or the diameter specified by the country).

variable.name: deadwood_C
description: Total carbon in aboveground dead wood, including standing dead wood and woody debris. IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.
extended.description: Total carbon in aboveground dead wood, including standing dead wood and woody debris. IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.
IPCC.notes: IPCC definition (Table 1.1): Includes all non-living woody biomass not contained in the litter, either standing, lying on the ground, or in the soil. Dead wood includes wood lying on the surface, dead roots, and stumps, larger than or equal to 10 cm in diameter (or the diameter specified by the country).

variable.name: deadwood_standing_OM
description: Total mass of aboveground standing dead wood (snags)
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.
extended.description: Total mass of aboveground standing dead wood (snags)

variable.name: deadwood_standing_C
description: Total carbon in aboveground standing dead wood (snags)
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length, allometric.equation.
extended.description: Total carbon in aboveground standing dead wood (snags)

variable.name: deadwood_down_OM
description: Total mass of downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris). IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length.
extended.description: Total mass of downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris). IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.

variable.name: deadwood_down_C
description: Total carbon in downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris). IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.
notes: Covariates depend on methodology. Include min.diameter, min.length.
extended.description: Total carbon in downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris). IPCC definition of coarse woody debris is >=10cm diameter.

variable.name: organic.layer_OM
description: Mass of litter/ organic layer/ forest floor. IPCC threshhold between CWD and litter is 10cm diameter.
notes: specify the exact components included in notes or methods
extended.description: Mass of litter/ organic layer/ forest floor. IPCC threshhold between CWD and litter is 10cm diameter.

variable.name: organic.layer_C
description: Carbon in litter/ organic layer/ forest floor. IPCC threshhold between CWD and litter is 10cm diameter.
notes: specify the exact components included in notes or methods
extended.description: Carbon in litter/ organic layer/ forest floor. IPCC threshhold between CWD and litter is 10cm diameter.

variable.name: soil_OM
description: Soil organic matter to specified depth in mineral soil
notes: depth refers to depth in mineral soil.
IPCC.C_pool: Soil organic matter - mineral soils [SOM mineral] (OMM)
extended.description: Soil organic matter to specified depth in mineral soil
IPCC.notes: IPCC default is 30cm depth

variable.name: soil_C
description: Soil organic carbon to specified depth in mineral soil
notes: depth refers to depth in mineral soil.
IPCC.C_pool: Soil organic matter - mineral soils [SOM mineral] (OMM)
extended.description: Soil organic carbon to specified depth in mineral soil
IPCC.notes: IPCC default is 30cm depth

variable.name: stand.density
description: Stand density
IPCC.notes: ancillary info for biomass density variable

variable.name: LAI
description: LAI: leaf area index (m2/m2)
IPCC.notes: ancillary info for biomass density variable

variable.name: leaf_pC
description: Leaf Percent C

variable.name: leaf_C2N
description: C:N ratio in leaves

variable.name: leaf_pN
description: Leaf Percent Nitrogen

variable.name: foliage_pN
description: Accumulation of foliage N of stand

variable.name: leaf_pCa
description: Foliar calcium concentration

variable.name: leaf_pK
description: Foliar K concentration

variable.name: leaf_pMg
description: Foliar magnesium concentration

variable.name: leaf_pP
description: Foliar P concentration

variable.name: stem_pC
description: C concentration in stems

variable.name: stem_pN
description: Nitrogen in stem

variable.name: root_pN
description: Percent N in belowground live tissue

variable.name: root_pC
description: Percent C in belowground live tissue

variable.name: soil_pC
description: Percent soil carbon content

variable.name: soil_C2N
description: C:N ratio in soil

variable.name: N.mineralization
description: Net N mineralization
IPCC.notes: relevant when associated with a land use/management change

variable.name: max.diameter
description: Maximum diameter of tree part being measured (stem, woody debris)
IPCC.notes: ancillary info

variable.name: min.diameter
description: Minimum diameter of tree part being measured (stem, woody debris)
IPCC.notes: ancillary info

variable.name: max.diameter_branch
description: Maximum branch diameter
IPCC.notes: ancillary info

variable.name: min.diameter_branch
description: Minimum branch diameter

variable.name: max.diameter_twig
description: Maximum twig diameter
IPCC.notes: ancillary info

variable.name: max.diameter_root
description: Maximum root diameter

variable.name: min.diameter_root
description: Minimum root diameter

variable.name: min.diameter_liana
description: Minimum diameter of lianas censused

variable.name: min.height
description: Minimum height
IPCC.notes: ancillary info

variable.name: min.length
description: Minimum length

variable.name: u.star
description: Friction velocity

variable.name: stem.level
description: Indicates whether the variable is computed at the individual tree (0; e.g., only counts mortality if all stems of a multi-stemmed individual die) or stem (1; e.g., counts stem mortality when the individual tree remains alive) level.
IPCC.notes: ancillary info

variable.name: include.recruitment
description: Indicates whether recruitment is counted as part of ANPP_woody_stem (0-no; 1-yes)
notes: Including recruitment in NPP estimates overestimates contributions of small stems, which have been growing for years before entering a tree census.
IPCC.notes: ancillary info
